name: Arlo's Plot Focuser - Flight Rising
description: Eliminate excess scrolling by bringing a specified plot to the top of the plot list. Install via Userstyles.World or the USO archive to customize on-the-fly.

additional_info:
How to use:
1. Hover over the plot to get its number.
2. Put that number into the style for the corresponding digsite.
3. It's now at the beginning of the list of plots. Hooray!
